name: Upgrade Settlement
description: Invest in infrastructure and urban development to advance your settlement's capabilities and unlock access to more advanced structures

criticalSuccess.description: Settlement level increases by 1 at half the normal cost (rounded up)

failure.description: Construction setbacks and delays waste resources. Pay half the upgrade cost (rounded up) with no level increase

criticalFailure.description: Planning disasters and coordination failures waste the full investment with no progress. Pay the full upgrade cost with no level increase

special: Cost equals the settlement's NEW level in gold. For example, upgrading from level 4 to level 5 costs 5 gold. Tier changes occur automatically when level and structure prerequisites are met.
